description:
Proton just released Proton Wallet, a Bitcoin-only wallet, while still advertising itself as a privacy-first company. I (and many others) are very confused behind the new release and what it means for Proton's mission as a whole. I dive into my initial thoughts, this is *not* a proper review, that's something I may do in the future if you all want it!

Opt Out Podcast: https://www.youtube.com/@OptOutPodcast

title: Proton released...a Bitcoin wallet 🤨
